Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1966...
Injured on 7/20/1967 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1972, off Tom Metcalf (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/18/1972, off Dick Joyce (ATL)...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 7/10/1977...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 5/10/1981...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1982, hitting .402 with 1 HR, 16 RBI...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Cincinnati on 7/7/1982 (Going to CIN: 2B D. Cash. Going to CHC: P P. Redfern)...
